NormalFlashTime.description: How long the Moon Rings flash at a normal speed, before they begin flashing quickly.

QuickFlashTime.description: How long the Moon Rings flash quickly before disappearing.

NormalFlashSpan.description: How long the delay is in-between flashes while the Moon Rings are flashing at a normal speed.

QuickFlashSpan.description: How long the delay is in-between flashes while the Moon Rings are flashing quickly

Rings.description: The Moon Rings which are controlled by this manager.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Extra.value: Object that controls all Silver Moon Rings in the stage.
